title: Therapy - Semi-Detached
description:
Therapy?
Semi-Detached
Metal/Rock
1998
192Kbps

1.Church Of Noise
2.Tightrope Walker
3.Black Eye Purple Sky
4.Lonely Cryin&#039; Only
5.Born Too Soon
6.Stay Happy
7.Safe
8.Straight Life
9.Heaven&#039;s Gate
10.Don&#039;t Expect Roses
11.Tramline
12.The Boy&#039;s Asleep


Although poor sales combined with a poor (almost non-existent) promotional drive from the now defunct record label have lead to the band and fans alike slating this album, it is undoubtedly one of Therapy?&#039;s finest offerings. Although a more diverse album, Semi-Detached is comparable to previous effort &#039;Troublegum&#039;, seeing the expanded line-up (with new drummer Graham Hopkins and guitarist/ cellist) return to the hard-edged, yet melodic rock music of their breakthrough album. Every song offers something new, with standout tracks &#039;Tightrope walker&#039; and &#039;Tramline&#039;, almost unlistenable in parts,moreG?Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Âª quite brilliant. Singles &#039;Church of noise&#039; and &#039;Lonely cryin&#039; only&#039;, two of the &#039;popier&#039; songs in the running order boast great sing-along choruses, although they are not the best tracks on the record by any means, being overshadowed by the less radio-friendly &#039;Black eye purple sky&#039;, &#039;Safe&#039; and &#039;Born too soon&#039;. With the emotional &#039;The Boy&#039;s asleep&#039; concluding proceedings, listeners will be left reaching for the repeat button.

Enjoy! :)
